description: Land Acquisiton - 17 and 03 Allotments in Pahala Andarawewa, Hambantota D/S Division, Hambantota District-Akurala, Hikkaduwa D/S Division, Galle Destrict - Dodangoda, Dodangoda D/S Division, Kalutara District - Amendments to the Notices Published in Gaz.
